meanings.definition: A compound of silicon and hydrogen, with the general formula SinH2n+2.
meanings.sent1: Silanes are important in chemistry because they contain silicon and hydrogen.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study silanes to understand their unique properties.
meanings.sent3: The silanes at the science fair were the talk of the town.
meanings.sent4: In the world of molecules, silanes are like the unsung heroes.
meanings.sent5: When you mix silicon and hydrogen, you get silanes - it's like magic!

meanings.definition: Silanes are used in the production of silicones.
meanings.sent1: Factories rely on silanes to make silicones for various products.
meanings.sent2: Silanes play a crucial role in creating durable silicones for construction.
meanings.sent3: The silanes in the lab decided to throw a party for the silicones.
meanings.sent4: Silanes are the building blocks that transform into versatile silicones.
meanings.sent5: Imagine a world without silanes - no silicones for anything!
